constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 127 (Friday, July 29, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. VAN DREW:
H.R. 8632.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The Congress shall have power to lay and collect taxes,
duties, imposts and excises, to pay the debts and provide for
the common defense and general welfare of the United States;
but all duties, imposts and excises shall be uniform
throughout the United States;
[Page H7540]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

title: No IDs for Illegals Act
